comments:
I extracted org.eclipse.hyades.use.cases, tried to profile StartStop class as Java application and encountered the following problems (I was able to profile StartStop without problems as external application).

Using tptp.sdk-TPTP-4.4.0-200702211545 and this configuration:
eclipse.buildId=I20070209-1006
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Windows XP x86-32 j9vmwi3223-20061001 (JIT enabled)

JIT  - 20060908_1811_r8

BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
